1.content: Welcome to the beginning, so to start off with, What are you?
1.title: Beginning

choices: A tray of tea and shortbread cookies. (near Satsuki)
A piano bench in a room primarily decorated in Pink. (near Nonon)
112.content:
"So, you're telling me that you want me to test the Beta version of the Probe Regalia Mark II?" Inumuta asked as he stared at the new Goku uniform Iori had just made.

         "Yes, I have taken countless amounts of data from Ryuko Matoi's battles against various school club leaders and uploaded it to the uniform, in addition, I have updated the Operating System of the suit to maximize the analyzing power of the suit." Iori explained as he began removing the uniform from the mannequin and carefully handing it to Inumuta. "This put together you should have enough power to utilize many of the other functions I put into the suit, such as the teleportation and data compression system. This will allow you to hide your presence and move to where ever you want unnoticed."

         "Alright, I guess I'll give it a shot then." Inumuta stated as he began to slip the uniform on over his tank-top and shorts.
         "The activation phrase is still the same, just stand over there and give it a go." Iori pointed over at a square on the lab floor.

         With that Inumuta began the activation sequence for the Regalia. "Three Star Goku Uniform. Probe Regalia, Mark II!" Inumuta felt the goku uniform envelop him in data, displaying every view around him, though one minor detail seemed off to him. "You said you updated the OS from Windows Vista, right?"
         "Yeah, what about it?"
"What did you update it to?"
         "Windows 8, why?"
With that Inumuta's eyes widened in horror, realizing the grievous mistake Iori made in his choice of software as a warning message came up stating "A Critical Error Has Occured."
"Oh Sh---- " and in a flash of blue light Inumuta was no longer in the lab.

Elsewhere...
"-it." Looking around Inumuta realized the Goku uniform had shorted out, and reverted back to its dormant state, in that same moment he realized that he was no longer in the lab, but more importantly he was about 2 and a half inches tall.
Though it appeared he was still in Honnouji Academy, it seemed as though he might still be in as he was standing on...
112.title: A Critical Error Has Occured

choices: Mako about to dig into her meal.
Ryuko trying convince herself that the mystery meat is anything but.
1123.content:
Upon further inspection Inumuta saw he was surrounded by strange bones protruding from the ground that seemed to be flaky and made of... Breading..? With stark realization Inumuta turned his eyes to the sky to try and find some form of evidence that he may be wrong in his guess of where he is, but the individual he sees before him only confirms his theory of where he his.

Who?
1123.title: Seriously, What is this stuff?

choices: He falls out just in time
His clothes are caught on the fork! He comes out with the fork
11232.content:
He rubbed his head, shocked as the disgusted face of Ryuko loomed in the sky. Her eyes not showing any recognition of the genius hacker as she slowly raised a fork, looking unwilling to move.
"What... is this?" Inumuta stumbled, his brain crackling into attention as a giant Mako appeared.

Mako happily slapped her friends back a few times,
"What's the matter Ryuko? Not hungry? I can help!" She smiled, licking her lips. Both girls unaware of the panicing tiny starting to struggle through what he realised to be Ryuko's food.
"N-no- it's fine..." Ryuko sighed, holding her breath- shutting her eyes and plunging her fork in.

Inumuta constantly tried to activate his Goku suit, to bring up screens, to fly, to do anything but it was met with failure as he ran.
"This is not- happeneing" He grumbled, rushing to get through the food.

His focus on his suit and escaping almost cost him dearly as a fork suddenly plunged into the 'meat' in the distance. He skidded to a stop, looking up as a knife came towards him. Eyes running wild, he dove out of the way just in time as the oblivious girl cut a chunk out of the food. The tiny Inumuta shivered as he watched it quickly vanish into the sky- getting jammed into Ryuko's mouth. Her eyes screwed closed, the loud chatter around the table, the fact that she was trying to swallow the gross concoction down as fast as possible, all of these factors screamed the obvious.

If he dodged the wrong way, he would currently be in that glob of food she was currently forcing down her throat. Ryuko's grossed out face and sickly looking expression showing that she isn't even enjoying the meal.
"I refuse to die such a pointless-" He stuttered, a glob of something that would barely class as food fell down, pinning himto the plate.

Downing some water, the giant girl glanced down at her plate.
"It's not... too bad... I can do this..." She muttered, cutting another piece off and jamming her fork into it. Her eyes closed again as she lunged forward, taking another bite.

Below her, Inumuta was cursing the unaware giant girl with all his might. She had just created a clean path out for him but his body was pinned.
"Let- me- out!" He growled, struggling with all his might to push himself out. His back scraped against the plate as he pushed his way out. Constantly glancing up at the giant girl as she looked back with disinterest, slowly getting used to the mystery meat. Her fork slipped into view, almost giving him a heart attack as it crashed near his head- onto an empty section of the plate. He looked at it for a moment, unsure what was going on when the food he was stuck to suddenly started to roll over towards the fork. He barely had the chance to yell before the mass of food rolled ontop of him fully- the fork slipped in under him.

Mako felt her own stomach growl as she watched Ryuko slowly rolled mystery meat onto her fork with a knife. Mako's own stomach growled unhappily.
"Mako... you can have the rest if you want" Ryuko sighed, pushing her plate over. A feeling of disgust washing over her as she watched Mako happily start eating, thanking her between mouthfuls.

No-one noticed the struggling arms trying to get leverage on the fork prongs to push itself to freedom. Inumuta's eyes widening as he saw how high up he was, Ryoko's closed legs in the distance. Fear struck him as he felt himself move closer and closer to the giant girl- the scenery of looking down Ryoko's body slowly becoming blocked out by Ryoko's greased up bottom lip. The previous bites of mystery meat having given it a shine.

He paniced, pushing himself forward and kicking in one last escape attempt.
11232.title: Ryukos Mystery Meal

112322.content:
Wincing, the tiny hacker just managed to pull through the forks prongs- cracking against the girls bottom row of teeth before bouncing over to her bottom lip.

Exausted, he glanced out at the blurry world before the fork pressed down onto him.
"St-" He wheezed, his body flattneing slightly as the metal slid out over his body- using the lip he was pressed into to pull the food off.

Once it finally plopped out of Ryuko's mouth, the boys tired and slightly flat body just lay stuck to the bottom lip as he listened to the food get chewed. His arms weakly tried dragging him away from the danger zone before she took a sip of water or licked her lips- he didn't know where he could go, he just knew this wasn't a safe place.

His body, slightly flattened and slimed up in grease, soon slid from it's resting point, down the lips and onto the moving chin as it mashed up the meal some people called 'food'. His voice failed him as he slid slightly under her chin before gravity took over- yanking him away from the girl and letting his limp body fall.
"R-Ryuko!" He croaked out, watching the girl wipe her mouth with the inside of her sleeve as he tumbled.
112322.title: He falls out just in time

choices: Sitting down to use the toilet.
113.content:
"Ha!" Mataro shouts as he is running away from the school to get back home. "It was way too easy to swipe that stupid watch from Mr. Mikisugi, but to think that weirdo would have something like this in his desk!"

         As it turned out, Mataro listened in on some of Ryuko and Mikisugi secret meetings thinking he might be able to get an eyeful, but instead he was plotting against the school with Ryuko. So as all good thieves go, he went to get some dirt on him so if he ever got into a hard scrap in school he would have some black mail material to use.

         Instead he found a get away device in his desk, something that could help him slip out of Honnouji Academy undetected. A shrink watch, something that Mataro decided to swipe and put to use for his own antics.

         Arriving home in a rush he went to his bed and immediately hid the watch under his pillow and waited for the perfect moment to strike.

         After a dinner of mystery meat, he went back to his bed and put the watch on, and went over to the bathroom door. As usual Ryuko was getting ready to take her evening shower before bed. Mataro being a clever kid knew exactly how to play his move, cracking the door open slightly, making a slight noise, and activated the watch quickly shrinking to 3 inches tall. Not even a minute later, the door opened and a fist punched at where his head would have been at normal height. As Ryuko looks around confused as to what could have disturbed her as she conducted her evening routine, Mataro ran into the bathroom, passing Ryuko's feet on the way, and hiding under the the sink.

Meanwhile, Ryuko closed the door and went back to.....
113.title: Unassuming Thief

I...." But ryuko was cut off, "shhhhh dont worry ryuko-chan, thanks to your new size, i can...."

12421.content:
"Ryuko, help, I'm down here" satsuki screamed, jumping up and down to make her sister aware of her, but this proved to be a mistake as soon after she said that ryuko said " ugh, fucking bugs" while rising her feet to crush her, satsuki watched in awe as the giant sneakers her sister was wearing rose but then began to run while screaming for her sister to stop, when the foot came down satsuki barely managed to avoid it, but never stopped asking for her sister to stop and help her "ryuko stop, damn it, its me satsuki". "S-satsuki?" Ryuko asked confused "How did you get so..... Small?" She asked her older sibling trying to make sense of any of this. "I don't know myself. I was drinking some tea that soroi made for me and next thing i knew, my clothe were too big and getting bigger." Satsuki explained, to her surprise, ryuko seemed to be.... Smiling? How can she smile at a time like this? "This is kinda..... Funny" ryuko said as she couldn't hold her laughter any longer, she bursted laughing at her sister predicament. It wasn't as if she made this or anything but it was just so ironic, satsuki was a tall and powerful person that always talks high and mighty but here she is, shrunken to a mouse size and begging for her little sister not to step on her like a pest.

"How can you laugh at a time like this?" Satsuki scolded ryuko "s-sorry, its just that its pretty funny to see you cut down to size" ryuko said while giggling "you have to stop this dumb mocking and help me" satsuki ordered her sister, but for ryuko it was kinda cute to see this small girl at her feet try and order her around, "and what if i say no? What are you gonna do? Bite my ancles?" Ryuko mocked her older sister putting a smug grin on her face, "thats not funny ryuko" said satsuki trying to make ryuko stop her teasing "sorry sis, from now on im the big sister, so i decide what is funny and believe me, this is pretty funny." It took satsuki sometime to get this but as she stared at her sister's towering height she understood the difference now. 12423.content:
"R-ragyo?" Satsuki squeaked as she recognized the giant as her own mother.

How is ragyo alive? Was a question satsuki had right now, it seems that when she 'killed herself' and became threads it was only a distraction to manage to get away from ryuko without having to lose her pride. She remained hidden for months waiting for a opportunity to strike her daughters, she found that, while researching life fibers, many of her secret labs found interesting types of weaponry and poisons, one in particular she found rather amusing, a poison capable of shrinking whoever drank it to the size of a doll. Once she found out rei homaru, her most loyal subject, had began working for satsuki she decided to make her move, she contacted rei, gave her the poison, rei managed to slip the poison in soroi's tea amd then gave it to satsuki. Meanwhile ragyo would infiltrate the facility to capture her daughter herself as to not compromise rei's status as a loyal employee of satsuki, that way, they might also shrink ryuko, but that came later.....

Ragyo heard a soft squeak coming from the floor,she could make out her name, looking down she saw her daughter diminished to nothing but a doll at her feet. "Is that how you adress your beloved mother after so long? " ragyo mocked. As she crouched to take a closer look at satsuki, the small gir felt fear like no other she felt before, the woman she hated most was now the size of a building in comparative to her, towering above her even while crouching, her dress covering her crotch while fully showing off the milky pillar that where her legs, separated at the belly into 2 stripes of clothe that barely covered her breast.

"H-how could this be?" Satsuki questioned the implications of this, "This can't be real. You died" her negation kicked in "Oh honey, believe me I AM REAL, you thought i would let my naughty daughter go after she has been such a bad little girl?" Ragyo kept belittling her daughter while also extending her hand to grab the small girl. Satsuki tried to fight the slender yet giant fingers that came to capture her, but in the end, all that struggle only made ragyo more aware over how weak satsuki was when compared. "That was fun, it cute to see someone so weak try to resist, but once I'm done, you will be nothing but a obedient little girl" ragyo licked her lips as she said this, soon after she began to fondle her daughters naked body, poking her breast, touching her pussy and squeezing her ass "i will never obey you, you are a monster" satsuki yelled defiantly while ragyo kept her sexual assault. "But I'm your Mommy, but i guess there is only one way to convince you....."

Option #1

Option #2
"I have to be more maternal" ragyo then pushes satsuki against her erect nipple and command her to kiss it until she feels she "breast feed" her eneough.

info.brief_description: Choose who is going to be shrinking and explore the halls of Honnouji Academy.
info.description:
Choose who is going to be shrinking and send them on their journey through the halls of Honnouji Academy, depending on who shrinks their goals may vary, be it finding away to get someone's attention to get back to normal, or perving on certain individuals.

Rules:
* Full tour is allowed and encouraged.
* Sex scenes and/or nudity are fine
* Must have good grammar and decently descriptive chapters, no short, one-sentence stuff unless it's for choosing a girl or main character.
* When starting a first chapter please add details on how they got into their situation, and move from their
* Feet stuff is okay, just not massive amounts of it.
* No male giants/ giant penises
* No death or digestion, its Kill la Kill, no one dies unless they are run through with a scissor blade or commit suicide, so their are all
kinds of explanations on why they are still alive
*Would prefer to leave this as No OCs.
* No Cock vore
*All other forms of Vore are welcome
